```{python}
from dbcooper.autotables import AutoTable
```

```{python}
from sqlalchemy import create_engine
from siuba.tests.helpers import SqlBackend

import lahman

engine = create_engine("sqlite:///:memory:")
```

```{python}
for name in ["allstar_full", "appearances"]:
    getattr(lahman, name)().to_sql(name, engine)
```

```{python}
tbl = AutoTable(engine)
tbl._init()
```

```{python}
from siuba import show_query, _, count

tbl.default.allstar_full() >> count(_.playerID)
```
